verses.verse: ( The Song of Moses and the Lamb) ( ( 50 32:1-47 )) Καὶ <WG2532> Kai Then εἶδον <WG3708> eidon I saw ἄλλο <WG243> allo another σημεῖον <WG4592> sēmeion sign ἐν <WG1722> en in τῷ <WG3588> tō - οὐρανῷ <WG3772> ouranō heaven : μέγα <WG3173> mega great καὶ <WG2532> kai and θαυμαστόν <WG2298> thaumaston marvelous ἀγγέλους <WG32> angelous angels ἑπτὰ <WG2033> hepta seven ἔχοντας <WG2192> echontas with πληγὰς <WG4127> plēgas plagues , ἑπτὰ <WG2033> hepta seven τὰς <WG3588> tas the ἐσχάτας <WG2078> eschatas final ὅτι <WG3754> hoti - ἐν <WG1722> en with αὐταῖς <WG846> autais [which] ἐτελέσθη <WG5055> etelesthē is completed . ὁ <WG3588> ho the θυμὸς <WG2372> thymos wrath τοῦ <WG3588> tou - Θεοῦ <WG2316> Theou of God

Καὶ <WG2532> Kai And εἶδον <WG3708> eidon I saw ὡς <WG5613> hōs [something] like θάλασσαν <WG2281> thalassan a sea ὑαλίνην <WG5193> hyalinēn of glass μεμιγμένην <WG3396> memigmenēn mixed πυρί <WG4442> pyri with fire , καὶ <WG2532> kai - τοὺς <WG3588> tous those who νικῶντας <WG3528> nikōntas had conquered ἐκ <WG1537> ek . . . τοῦ <WG3588> tou the θηρίου <WG2342> thēriou beast καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἐκ <WG1537> ek - τῆς <WG3588> tēs - εἰκόνος <WG1504> eikonos image αὐτοῦ <WG846> autou its καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἐκ <WG1537> ek - τοῦ <WG3588> tou the ἀριθμοῦ <WG706> arithmou number τοῦ <WG3588> tou - ὀνόματος <WG3686> onomatos name . αὐτοῦ <WG846> autou of its ἑστῶτας <WG2476> hestōtas stood ἐπὶ <WG1909> epi beside τὴν <WG3588> tēn vvv θάλασσαν <WG2281> thalassan vvv τὴν <WG3588> tēn vvv ὑαλίνην <WG5193> hyalinēn [which] ἔχοντας <WG2192> echontas They were holding κιθάρας <WG2788> kitharas harps τοῦ <WG3588> tou - Θεοῦ <WG2316> Theou from God ,

καὶ <WG2532> kai and ᾄδουσιν <WG103> adousin they sang τὴν <WG3588> tēn the ᾠδὴν <WG5603> ōdēn song Μωϋσέως <WG3475> Mōuseōs Moses τοῦ <WG3588> tou - δούλου <WG1401> doulou servant τοῦ <WG3588> tou of Θεοῦ <WG2316> Theou God’s καὶ <WG2532> kai and τὴν <WG3588> tēn - ᾠδὴν <WG5603> ōdēn - τοῦ <WG3588> tou of the Ἀρνίου <WG721> Arniou Lamb λέγοντες <WG3004> legontes - : Μεγάλα <WG3173> Megala “ Great καὶ <WG2532> kai and θαυμαστὰ <WG2298> thaumasta wonderful [are] τὰ <WG3588> ta - ἔργα <WG2041> erga works , σου <WG4771> sou Your Κύριε <WG2962> Kyrie O Lord ὁ <WG3588> ho - Θεός <WG2316> Theos God ὁ <WG3588> ho - Παντοκράτωρ <WG3841> Pantokratōr Almighty ! δίκαιαι <WG1342> dikaiai Just καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἀληθιναὶ <WG228> alēthinai true [are] αἱ <WG3588> hai - ὁδοί <WG3598> hodoi ways , σου <WG4771> sou Your ὁ <WG3588> ho O Βασιλεὺς <WG935> Basileus King τῶν <WG3588> tōn of the ἐθνῶν <WG1484> ethnōn nations ! ( SBL and WH King of the ages; TR King of the saints)

τίς <WG5101> tis Who οὐ <WG3756> ou vvv μὴ <WG3361> mē vvv φοβηθῇ <WG5399> phobēthē will not fear [You] , Κύριε <WG2962> Kyrie O Lord , καὶ <WG2532> kai and δοξάσει <WG1392> doxasei glorify τὸ <WG3588> to - ὄνομά <WG3686> onoma name ? σου <WG4771> sou Your ὅτι <WG3754> hoti For [You] μόνος <WG3441> monos alone [are] ὅσιος <WG3741> hosios holy . ὅτι <WG3754> hoti - πάντα <WG3956> panta All τὰ <WG3588> ta - ἔθνη <WG1484> ethnē nations ἥξουσιν <WG2240> hēxousin will come καὶ <WG2532> kai and προσκυνήσουσιν <WG4352> proskynēsousin worship ἐνώπιόν <WG1799> enōpion before σου <WG4771> sou You , ὅτι <WG3754> hoti for τὰ <WG3588> ta - δικαιώματά <WG1345> dikaiōmata righteous acts σου <WG4771> sou Your ἐφανερώθησαν <WG5319> ephanerōthēsan have been revealed . ”

( Preparation for Judgment) Καὶ <WG2532> Kai - μετὰ <WG3326> meta After ταῦτα <WG3778> tauta this εἶδον <WG3708> eidon I looked , καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἠνοίγη <WG455> ēnoigē was opened ὁ <WG3588> ho the ναὸς <WG3485> naos temple — τῆς <WG3588> tēs the σκηνῆς <WG4633> skēnēs tabernacle τοῦ <WG3588> tou of the μαρτυρίου <WG3142> martyriou Testimony — ἐν <WG1722> en in τῷ <WG3588> tō - οὐρανῷ <WG3772> ouranō heaven .

καὶ <WG2532> kai And ἐξῆλθον <WG1831> exēlthon came οἱ <WG3588> hoi the ἑπτὰ <WG2033> hepta seven ἄγγελοι <WG32> angeloi angels οἱ <WG3588> hoi - ἔχοντες <WG2192> echontes with τὰς <WG3588> tas the ἑπτὰ <WG2033> hepta seven πληγὰς <WG4127> plēgas plagues , ἐκ <WG1537> ek out τοῦ <WG3588> tou of the ναοῦ <WG3485> naou temple ἐνδεδυμένοι <WG1746> endedymenoi dressed in λίνον <WG3043> linon linen καθαρὸν <WG2513> katharon clean λαμπρὸν <WG2986> lampron [and] bright καὶ <WG2532> kai and περιεζωσμένοι <WG4024> periezōsmenoi girded with περὶ <WG4012> peri around τὰ <WG3588> ta [their] στήθη <WG4738> stēthē chests . ζώνας <WG2223> zōnas sashes χρυσᾶς <WG5552> chrysas golden

Καὶ <WG2532> Kai Then ἓν <WG1520> hen one ἐκ <WG1537> ek of τῶν <WG3588> tōn the τεσσάρων <WG5064> tessarōn four ζῴων <WG2226> zōōn living creatures ἔδωκεν <WG1325> edōken gave τοῖς <WG3588> tois the ἑπτὰ <WG2033> hepta seven ἀγγέλοις <WG32> angelois angels ἑπτὰ <WG2033> hepta seven φιάλας <WG5357> phialas bowls χρυσᾶς <WG5552> chrysas golden γεμούσας <WG1073> gemousas full τοῦ <WG3588> tou of the θυμοῦ <WG2372> thymou wrath τοῦ <WG3588> tou - Θεοῦ <WG2316> Theou of God , τοῦ <WG3588> tou who ζῶντος <WG2198> zōntos lives εἰς <WG1519> eis vvv τοὺς <WG3588> tous vvv αἰῶνας <WG165> aiōnas forever τῶν <WG3588> tōn [and] αἰώνων <WG165> aiōnōn ever .

καὶ <WG2532> kai And ἐγεμίσθη <WG1072> egemisthē was filled ὁ <WG3588> ho the ναὸς <WG3485> naos temple καπνοῦ <WG2586> kapnou with smoke ἐκ <WG1537> ek from τῆς <WG3588> tēs the δόξης <WG1391> doxēs glory τοῦ <WG3588> tou - Θεοῦ <WG2316> Theou of God καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἐκ <WG1537> ek from τῆς <WG3588> tēs - δυνάμεως <WG1411> dynameōs power ; αὐτοῦ <WG846> autou His καὶ <WG2532> kai and οὐδεὶς <WG3762> oudeis no one ἐδύνατο <WG1410> edynato could εἰσελθεῖν <WG1525> eiselthein enter εἰς <WG1519> eis . . . τὸν <WG3588> ton the ναὸν <WG3485> naon temple ἄχρι <WG891> achri until τελεσθῶσιν <WG5055> telesthōsin were completed . αἱ <WG3588> hai the ἑπτὰ <WG2033> hepta seven πληγαὶ <WG4127> plēgai plagues τῶν <WG3588> tōn of the ἑπτὰ <WG2033> hepta seven ἀγγέλων <WG32> angelōn angels
